title: Sampler, late 18th–early 19th century
medium:
Medium: cotton embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered with drawnwork on plain weave
creditline: Gift of the estate of Mrs. Lathrop Colgate Harper
description: Rectangle of fine linen divided by chain stitch into thirty-five small squares, inside each of which a variety of drawnwork and darning methods are worked in white cotton.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, late 18th–early 19th century.
late 18th–early 19th century. Medium: cotton embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered with drawnwork on plain weave. Gift of the estate of Mrs. Lathrop Colgate Harper. 1957-180-87.
